Name: TC_LOGIN_001
Precondition:
User is on the fintech login page
User has a registired fintech account
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The entered email is accepted without validation errors.

The system proceeds to the next step without displaying any validation 
errors.
The entered password is accepted without validation errors.

The system redirects the user to the email verification page to complete 
the authentication process.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Select email verification and click the next button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system accepts the selected email verification option and displays the 
email verification code entry page

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter a valid verification code and click the Submit button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system accepts the email verification code and redirects to the user 
account dashboard

Name: TC_LOGIN_002
Precondition:
User is on the fintech login page
User has a registired fintech account
Objective: Verify login attempt with invalid email
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system rejects the entered email address and displays an error message.

Name: TC_LOGIN_003
Precondition:
User is on the fintech login page
User has a registired fintech account
Objective: Verify login attempt with empty email field
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system rejects the empty email address and displays an error message.

Name: TC_LOGIN_004
Precondition:
User is on the fintech login page
User has a registired fintech account
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The entered email or phone number is accepted without validation errors.

The system proceeds to the next step without displaying any validation 
errors

The system accepts the password input without performing validation at this 
step
The system rejects the entered password and displays an error message

Name: TC_LOGIN_005
Precondition:
User is on the fintech login page
User has a registired fintech account
Objective: Verify login attempt with unregistered email address
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The system accepts entered email address without performing account 
existence validation at this step

The system displays an error message about email address indicating that 
the email address is not registered
